ResizeObserverEntryDevicePixelContentBox.summary:
The devicePixelContentBoxSize read-only property of
the interface returns an array containing the size in device pixels of the observed element when the callback is run.
ResizeObserverEntryDevicePixelContentBox.value:
An array containing objects with the new size of the observed element in device pixels. The
